headline: PH Q1 Earnings Call: Margin Expansion and Aerospace Strength Offset Industrial Weakness
summary: Industrial machinery company Parker-Hannifin (NYSE:PH) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, but sales fell by 2.2% year on year to $4.96 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $6.94 per share was 3.2% above analysts’ consensus estimates.
